mangalikage gayana hurubuhutikama gana anawaki pala kale pallewaththa gurupiyanan pamanak noweya.ethera bhathkhanda sangitha sarasawiye lekhakadhikarithumiya wana mira mathur mathiniya wisharada parikshanayedi mangalika dakwu suwisheshi dakshathawa daka indiyawata with purna ragadhari sangithaya uganna lesath ee sandaha siyaluma aakara pahasukam, aadhara labadennatath prathignya dunnaya.sanyuktha thatiyak bihikarannata aya wasara 10 gaththak men, mira mathur mathiniyage karunika menma durlabhawa labena wasana gunopetha arayuma pilibandawa sithanne nam merata saba sangithaye aarohanaya balaporoththu wana sahrudayange somnasata eya hethuwanu athi.mangalikage “obe malgomuwen” githa samuchchaye gi pada rachanawanhi wishaya kshethra itha wiwidhathwayakin yuthu prasthutha ha adawi gananawakata wihidi wisiri yayi.
